title: Differential Equation with slope field part - a

content.question: The slope field for the given differential equation is shown below. Sketch the solution curve that passes through the point (3, -1) and sketch the solution curve that passes through the point (1, 2) . (Note: The points (3, -1) and (1, 2) are indicated in the figure.)

frqParts.text: The slope field for the given differential equation is shown below. Sketch the solution curve that passes through the point (3, -1) and sketch the solution curve that passes through the point (1, 2) . (Note: The points (3, -1) and (1, 2) are indicated in the figure.)

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
